tika.dc.description: Like it or not, Java Script is everywhere these days—from browser to server to mobile—and now you, too, need to learn the language or dive deeper than you have. This concise book starts with a quick-start guide that teaches you just enough of the language to help you be productive right away. More experienced JavaScript programmers will find a complete and easy-to-read reference that covers each language feature in depth.
dc.subject: javascript
o'reilly
